resources.string: Please install OpenVPN Connect App frist
Do you want to use this theme file?

The theme file need to save in Donwload folder 
 After you click apply the theme, you need to do as below:
 1.go back to LINE APP
 2.go to settings of LIEN 
 3.choose the apply to origin theme 
 4.then LIEN will restart, go back to settings 
 5.disable the network, choose apply the robbit theme

After you click apply the theme, you need to do as below:
 1.go back to LINE APP
 2.go to settings of LIEN 
 3.choose the apply to origin theme 
 4.then LIEN will restart, go back to settings 
 5.disable the network, choose apply the robbit theme
Sorry, cannot find any theme file in Download folder of SDCARD, you can use the refrash button to reload again
